backend/main.mo: Simple Motoko actor defining one immutable and one mutable variable.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required UI updates and associated files for multiple components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing pre-generated summaries of various frontend files and assets.
frontend/.github/workflows/production-pu: GitHub Actions workflow that validates the production slug and related deployment files on pushes and PRs.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing production slug rules, validation steps, and pre-deployment requirements.
frontend/domain-slug.json: Defines the canonical productionSlug value 'galfashionworld-2014' with metadata.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and global light/dark theme rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, and loading the React app root.
frontend/scripts/validate-production-slu: Node script that reads domain-slug.json and verifies the productionSlug matches the expected value.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling the full page layout with all sections.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component rendering descriptive text about the company without images.
frontend/src/components/BagGallery.tsx: Gallery component displaying a grid of handbag material cards with images, names, and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Section with contact info (email, phone, location) and embedded ContactForm.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Stateful contact form with validation, simulated async submission, and success message UI.
frontend/src/components/Features.tsx: Renders a grid of feature cards describing the company's advantages.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with brand info, navigation links, services, contact details, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with scroll-based styling, navigation links, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with marketing text and buttons to scroll to contact or about sections.
frontend/src/components/SectionLayout.ts: Layout wrapper component providing consistent spacing and container styles for sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global Tailwind layers, theme variables, and enforces Times New Roman italic styling across all elements with light/dark palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider, and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color variables, Times New Roman typography, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, deployment notes, and design instructions for the Gal Fashion World website.
